SEARCH
Module com.example.cab302simplestock
Package com.example.cab302simplestock.model.Managers

Class ViewUserManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.cab302simplestock.model.Managers.ViewUserManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IViewUserManager
public class ViewUserManager extends Object implements IViewUserManager
Implementation of the viewUserManager interface using a viewUser DAO for the managing of viewUsers. Uses a user manager to handle methods that interact directly with users. Uses dependency injection to get the viewUser DAO and the user manager.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    ViewUserManager(IViewUserDAO viewUserDAO, IUserManager userManager)
    Constructs a new viewUser manager with the viewUser DAO and user manager injected.

    • ViewUserManager

      public ViewUserManager(IViewUserDAO viewUserDAO, IUserManager userManager)
      Constructs a new viewUser manager with the viewUser DAO and user manager injected.
      Parameters:
      viewUserDAO - The viewUser DAO to use.
      userManager - The user manager to use.

  • Method Details

    • addViewUser

      public int addViewUser(ViewUser viewUser)
      Adds a new viewUser to the database, all values for the viewUser should be set, except for the ID value which is set by the database.
      Specified by:
      addViewUser in interface IViewUserManager
      Parameters:
      viewUser - The viewUser to add.
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly added viewUser.

    • updateViewUser

      public void updateViewUser(ViewUser viewUser)
      Updates an existing viewUser in the database, every value should be set in the viewUser parameter. The viewUser in the database will have every single value overwritten by this method. Any empty value set in the parameter will overwrite the old value with an empty value.
      Specified by:
      updateViewUser in interface IViewUserManager
      Parameters:
      viewUser - The viewUser with its values to update. The ID must be set for the database to find the viewUser.

    • deleteViewUser

      public void deleteViewUser(ViewUser viewUser)
      Deletes a viewUser from the database, only the ID value for the viewUser to delete needs to be set. If this method is called it should be assumed the viewUser is gone and unrecoverable.
      Specified by:
      deleteViewUser in interface IViewUserManager
      Parameters:
      viewUser - The viewUser to delete. Only the ID needs to be set, as the database uses the ID to find the viewUser.

    • getAllViewUsers

      public List<ViewUser> getAllViewUsers()
      Gets all viewUsers that exist in the database.
      Specified by:
      getAllViewUsers in interface IViewUserManager
      Returns:
      A list of all viewUsers.

    • getUsersInGroup

      public List<User> getUsersInGroup(int groupID)
      Finds and gets all users that have access to a group.
      Specified by:
      getUsersInGroup in interface IViewUserManager
      Parameters:
      groupID - The group to find which users have access to.
      Returns:
      A list of all users with access to the group.

    • findUserInGroup

      public User findUserInGroup(int userID, int groupID)
      Searches for and gets a user in a group based on the users ID
      Specified by:
      findUserInGroup in interface IViewUserManager
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the users to search for.
      groupID - The ID of the group to search in.
      Returns:
      The user if found in the group, i.e. the user has access to the group.

    • addUserToGroup

      public int addUserToGroup(User user, int groupID)
      Grants access for a user to a specific group. Should create a viewUser with the user and group for its values.
      Specified by:
      addUserToGroup in interface IViewUserManager
      Parameters:
      user - The user to grant access to.
      groupID - The ID of the group the user should have access to.
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly created viewUser.

    • findViewUser

      public ViewUser findViewUser(int userID, int groupID)
      Finds and gets a viewUser based on the user and group it references.
      Specified by:
      findViewUser in interface IViewUserManager
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user it references.
      groupID - The ID of the group it references.
      Returns:
      The found viewUser.
